java.lang.Object
  org.dellroad.stuff.spring.ThreadTransactionalAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Annotation, Transactional
public class ThreadTransactionalAdapter
extends Object
implements Annotation, Transactional

Adapter that converts a @ThreadTransactional annotation into a adTransactional one.

Used internally by ThreadTransactionalAnnotationParser.

See Also:
ThreadTransactional, Transactional
